name: Nowledge Mem
description: Local-first personal memory for Alma, powered by nmem CLI

tools.name: Search Memory
tools.description: Search your personal knowledge base by semantic relevance.

tools.name: Query Memory
tools.description: One-shot query across memories with thread fallback.

tools.name: Store Memory
tools.description: Store an insight, decision, or finding in your personal knowledge base.

tools.name: Show Memory
tools.description: Show full details for a single memory by id.

tools.name: Update Memory
tools.description: Update an existing memory by id.

tools.name: Read Working Memory
tools.description: Read your daily Working Memory briefing from ~/ai-now/memory.md.

tools.name: Show Thread
tools.description: Show one thread and its messages.

nowledgeMem.autoRecall.description: Inject central memory context on first user message in a thread.

nowledgeMem.autoCapture.description: Save active thread to Nowledge Mem when Alma quits.

nowledgeMem.maxRecallResults.description: Maximum memories to include during auto-recall.
